title: H&M Women's Pleated Midi Skirt - Black - Size S
description: The H&M Women's Pleated Midi Skirt in Black offers a sophisticated and stylish option for any wardrobe. This skirt features a classic pleated design that adds a touch of elegance and movement to your outfit. The midi length falls gracefully below the knee, and the elasticized waistband provides a comfortable and adjustable fit. Made from a lightweight, airy fabric, this skirt is perfect for both casual and formal occasions. Available in black, this versatile skirt can be dressed up or down to suit a variety of events.
key_features: Elegant pleated design for added texture
Comfortable elasticized waistband for a perfect fit
Lightweight fabric for a soft, airy feel
Midi length for a versatile, stylish look
meta_title: H&M Women's Pleated Midi Skirt - Black - Size S
meta_description: Discover the H&M Women's Pleated Midi Skirt in Black. Featuring a classic pleated design, lightweight fabric, and an elasticized waistband. Ideal for both casual and formal occasions. Size S available.

title: H&M Women's Pleated Midi Skirt - Black - Size M
description: The H&M Women's Pleated Midi Skirt in Black is a versatile and elegant choice for any wardrobe. Featuring a stylish pleated design that adds texture and movement, this skirt is made from a lightweight fabric that is both comfortable and breathable. The midi length and elasticized waistband ensure a flattering fit for a range of body types, making this skirt suitable for both casual and formal occasions. The timeless black color adds sophistication and pairs well with various tops and accessories.
key_features: Stylish pleated design for added elegance
Midi length for a versatile, fashionable look
